org.threadly.load

Class SequentialScriptBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.load.AbstractScriptBuilder
      • org.threadly.load.SequentialScriptBuilder

  • public class SequentialScriptBuilder
extends AbstractScriptBuilder

    A builder which's added steps will all be executed in sequence.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a new SequentialScriptBuilder.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SequentialScriptBuilder

        public SequentialScriptBuilder()
        Constructs a new SequentialScriptBuilder. This can be used as either the start of a execution chain, or can later be provided into AbstractScriptBuilder.addSteps(SequentialScriptBuilder).

    • Method Detail

      • hasSteps

        public boolean hasSteps()
        Description copied from class: AbstractScriptBuilder
        Checks if the builder has had at least one step added to it. If this returns false then this builder is effectively a no-op.
        Specified by:
        hasSteps in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Returns:
        true if at least one step is attached to this builder

      • makeCopy

        public SequentialScriptBuilder makeCopy()
        Description copied from class: AbstractScriptBuilder
        Make a copy of the script chain. This is necessary if you want to add the chain multiple times to another chain. The returned chain will execute the same script step instances (so if added to a parallel builder make sure the script steps are thread safe).
        Specified by:
        makeCopy in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Returns:
        A copy builder

      • getMaximumNeededThreadCount

        public int getMaximumNeededThreadCount()
        Description copied from class: AbstractScriptBuilder
        Call to check how many threads this script will need to execute at the current build point. This can give you an idea of how intensely parallel this script is. Though it should be known that less threads may be started than this. If the rate limiting is being used, depending on how fast test steps are completing not all threads may be used.
        Overrides:
        getMaximumNeededThreadCount in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Returns:
        Number of threads to run script at it's most parallel point

      • addStep

        public void addStep(ScriptStep step)
        Adds a step to be run sequentially. This step will be ran after previously added steps have completed.
        Specified by:
        addStep in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Parameters:
        step - Test step to be added

      • addSteps

        public void addSteps(SequentialScriptBuilder sequentialSteps)
        Adds a set of steps to be run sequentially. These sequential steps wont be started until all previously added steps have completed. The execution graph of the provided steps will be maintained. Future steps wont be executed till all provided steps are complete. The provided builder can not be modified after being provided. It also can not be provided as steps again. If needing to provide again, please use makeCopy().
        Specified by:
        addSteps in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Parameters:
        sequentialSteps - Sequential steps to add to this builder

      • addSteps

        public void addSteps(ParallelScriptBuilder parallelSteps)
        Adds a set of steps which will run in parallel. The execution graph of the provided steps will be maintained. So the provided parallel steps will run in parallel as built, and future steps added to this builder will not be executed till this provided builder has finished running. The provided builder can not be modified after being provided. It also can not be provided as steps again. If needing to provide again, please use makeCopy().
        Specified by:
        addSteps in class AbstractScriptBuilder
        Parameters:
        parallelSteps - Parallel steps to add to this builder
